name: Verify emails in a Google Sheets spreadsheet using Hunter
description: Every time a new row added to a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically check the email containing in this record using Hunter and update a row with information about validity of the email. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1VlaaXTQfkNj2x3SAnvwi2z7FAZ_JQhUwNPLfTKIUOXM/edit?usp=sharing).
